__e: A true Samurai never leaves loose ends!
Is a warrior also not a man with blood flowing through his veins?
Women in a samurai family ask no questions...
A samurai carrying a girl on his back in broad daylight!
That one samurai's good, but how'll the other six be?
I am merely trying to free this world of samurai and catch all bandits!
The samurai has been dead for 100 years.
In this samurai household, for you, Mother, who has tried your utmost to protect my pride as a warrior, and for Father and Sister too,
I hardly think those country samurai can do much.
Your father's samurai have always treated me as well as can be expected.
A country samurai who doesn't care what happens?
